constituent: strict, loincloth, retainer, slave, crotch, soil, dirt, ground
koohiiStory1: The strict parent thinks adolescent kids are "slaves to their crotch" (= can´t control their hormones), so he grounds them. Permanently!
koohiiStory2: I´m very strict about not just sleeping with anyone. People who are slaves to their crotches often end up with dirty genitalia and I don´t want to get their VD. (on yomi=ケン).
myStory: cứng, rắn, khó. thêm nữa. chỗ thêm nưa vào đất nên khó. chữ Kiên.
words: 堅い(かたい): hard (especially wood), steadfast, honorable, stuffy writing
